channel.title: I have a problem with my client
channel.description:
Hello,
When ever i log into my client, i'm doing fine.
I click once to walk around and it works.. but then my second click the client "Crashes" and closes.. why is it doing this?
[b]1.)[/b]I log in [b]1.)[/b]when i click twice the client crashes
this happens on every client i use..

item.title: I have a problem with my client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“goodone123, post:1, topic:388267”]Hello,

When ever i log into my client, i’m doing fine.

I click once to walk around and it works… but then my second click the client “Crashes” and closes… why is it doing this?

1.)I log in
1.)when i click twice the client crashes

this happens on every client i use…[/quote]

You will probably get different answers, because people believe it’s caused by different things. The most common response is that it’s a problem with the 64-bit Java Hotspot. Others will say it’s this, plus a bad algorithm for determining a walking path. The only thing you can really do that(might?) help is to use the 32-bit JDK/JRE.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a problem with my client
